    #include<cstdio>
    #include<cmath>
    #include<iostream>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
    	int t;
    	cin>>t;
    	while(t--)
    	{
    		string str;
    		cin>>str;
    		int i,c=0;
    		for(i=0;i<str.length();i++)
    		{
    			if(str[i]=='A' || str[i]=='D' || str[i]=='O' || str[i]=='P' || str[i]=='R' || str[i]=='Q')
    			{
    			c++;	
    			}
    			if(str[i]=='B')
    			{
    				c= c+2;
    			}
    		}
    		cout<<c<<"\n";
    	}
    }
